channel.title: I can't get my server online
channel.description:
Hello, i'm trying to make an own server called MopaScape, based on Telescape by Telenubby. I followed a tutorial and edited a source. I can log in, but my friend can't although i run my server without any problems. Who can help me? I made some pics of my router, no-ip e.o.
[img]http://img180.imageshack.us/img180/7104/noipnz9.jpg[/img] My no-ip works...
[img]http://img116.imageshack.us/img116/2553/linksysyl3.jpg[/img] The configuration of my linksys router
[img]http://img180.imageshack.us/img180/9375/linksys2vk4.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img381.imageshack.us/img381/2765/compileandrunqt3.jpg[/img] Like you can see, my server runs
[img]http://img244.imageshack.us/img244/8348/offlinepy9.jpg[/img] But it's offline!
Who can help me? I'm already trying a week to get my server online, could het be the 0.0.0.0 on the 4th image? Please help me.
Kind Regards Patrick

item.title: I can't get my server online
item.dc:creator: @Brouwers.Archer Brouwers.Archer
item.description:
@Brouwers.Archer wrote:

i don´t know which version of mysql-connector-java i have. But i know that i´ve jdk1.06_07

Read full topic

item.title: I can't get my server online
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

Client.java? see topic for more details

if you cant find client.java u mite not have WinRAR installed also make sure u exracted it all to desktop if you need any more help add my msn * imtheman8@hotmail.co.uk *

I'm having trouble running .bat files

mhm u do have WinRAR installed right ? if you do make sure you have exracted the source you downloaded to desktop then try running

ash dude34:

erm, are you sure u have WinRAR installed? + have you exracted your server files to your desktop then tryed running?

You and your WinRar

Read full topic
item.source: I can't get my server online

item.title: I can't get my server online
item.dc:creator: @ash_dude34 ash dude34
item.description:
@ash_dude34 wrote:

erm, are you sure u have WinRAR installed? + have you exracted your server files to your desktop then tryed running?

if none of these work then simply

right click runserver and then it should say somthink like

@echo off
color 0a
title Endless Pures
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

                                                                                    /\/\ change the java-.3.0.08 to what ever kind of java/jdk you have

Read full topic
